content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. Let's focus on the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Considering the prime location and modern features of your apartment, I believe the standard market rent is slightly higher than what I can comfortably afford at the moment. Could we explore negotiating a lower price, perhaps around 600 Euros per month?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price you're suggesting is much lower than I'm willing to accept. I am looking for a higher price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood. However, given my financial constraints and numerous other options available, I must pass on this apartment if the rent cannot be adjusted to a more affordable range around 600 Euros per month. Thank you for your time, but I'll need to explore other possibilities. TERMINATE
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China
